title: Sketchbook Folio, "Three Herms, Studies after Carracci", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 48 Lodovico Caraci, Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper left drawing of seated female herm flanked by 2 putti and 2 female herms, supporting bracket. Upper right drawing of seated male herm flanked by 2 putti with garlands, and 2 female herms, supporting bracket. Lower left drawing of standing male herm flanked by male and female satyr with horns of plenty, and two female herms, supporting bracket. Lower right drawing of male figure seated on and struggling with what seems to be sphinx.
